title: Mary, Queen of the Apostles Novena

days.title: Day 1 Prayer
days.text:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

O Mary, Queen of the Apostles, you who were present with the Apostles in prayer at Pentecost, intercede for us before your Son, that we may be filled with the gifts of the Holy Spirit.
You who nurtured the early Church with your prayers and presence, help us to be faithful disciples of your Son, steadfast in prayer and united in love.
Grant us the gift of faith like that of the Apostles, that we may boldly proclaim the Gospel to all nations, trusting in your intercession and guidance.
O Mary, Queen of the Apostles, we entrust our prayers and petitions to your loving care, knowing that you intercede for us before your Son.
May we follow your example in faith, hope, and love, and may we, like the Apostles, proclaim the Good News to all the world. 
Amen.

Concluding Prayer

Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be
Mary, Queen of the Apostles, pray for us!
